title: War Table
info: The War Table is an animated furniture item that is dropped by the Dark Mage during the Old One's Army event. It counts as a flat surface for housing, but has no special functions, and can not be stood upon. During the last Tier 1 wave, it has a 10% chance to drop; during the fourth and sixth Tier 3 waves, it has a 5% chance to drop.
